en.wellLongDescription: Passionate creator who enjoys both web development and 3D modeling. With affinity for design, I pay meticulous attention to detail. Furthermore, I actively share my knowledge by teaching and imparting classes to others.

skills.title: Frontend Developer
skills.content: Developing focused on Vanilla JS, React and styling with CSS & SASS. Creating user-friendly web applications with attention to detail and clean code.

skills.title: 3D Modelling & Design
skills.content: As I have mentioned before my passion is creation. While I often design interfaces, I also delve into 3D character and asset design. Take a look at my portfolio to explore my design creations.

skills.title: Software Dev Teacher
skills.content: Experienced software development teacher specializing in 3D design and programming. Guiding, mentoring and imparting skills in both 3D modeling and programming.

en.contactContent: Feel free to reach out by sending me an email or saying hello on my social networks. Let's discuss your project and bring your vision to life together.
